thread.title: I fell in love with my room
thread.title_full: I fell in love with my room - Review of San Carlos Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SallyZohney
title: I fell in love with my room
text:
According to NY standards the room is HUGE! I stayed for 5 days in a king size bed in single room and it was one of the best hotel experiences I had. The room was so warm and quiet, elegant and clean. Very big space to fit luggage, working desk, it had all the equipment to make a quick meal: microwave, mini-bar, dishes and plates, wine opener and wine glasses and coffee machine. The hotel is in a nice location in mid-town Manhattan although a bit of a walk to the subway but close enough to many great restaurants and shops.
I would totally recommend it for any purpose of traveling.
Room Tip: best to have a room with a city view See more room tips
